pkgmetadata.longdescription: Systemic Scenario Selection for Stress Testing // Quasi-Monte- Carlo algorithm for systematic generation of shock scenarios from an arbitrary multivariate elliptical distribution. The algorithm selects a systematic mesh of arbitrary fineness that approximately evenly covers an isoprobability ellipsoid in d dimensions (Flood, Mark D. Korenko, George G. (2013) doi:10.1080/14697688.2014.926018). This package is the 'R' analogy to the 'Matlab' code published by Flood Korenko in above-mentioned paper.
